response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am confident it could greatly benefit your endeavors. I propose to sell this product to you for $1,200,000, aiming to achieve a fair balance between the value it holds for both of us. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
